record.title: Mr. BOSWELL. Mr. Speaker, due to personal business in Iowa, I was unable to return to Washington for

speaking.paragraph:
Mr. Speaker, due to personal business in Iowa, I was unable to return to Washington for -- (House of Representatives - September 17, 2007)

[Page: H10408]

Mr. Speaker, due to personal business in Iowa, I was unable to return to Washington for votes on Monday, September 17, 2007. If I had been here, I would have voted "yea" on H.R. 3246, H.R. 1657 and H.R. 3527.
